select , , ,
from PAYMENT_SOURCE ps inner join CONSTITUENT p on ps.CONSTITUENT_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID left outer join PHONE ph on ps.PHONE_ID = ph.PHONE_ID left outer join ADDRESS addr on ps.ADDRESS_ID = addr.ADDRESS_ID where p.SITE_NAME = #siteName#
sqlMap.select: and ps.CONSTITUENT_ID = #constituentId# order by ps.INACTIVE asc, PAYMENT_SRC_TYPE
and ps.CONSTITUENT_ID = #constituentId# and ps.INACTIVE = false order by PAYMENT_SRC_TYPE

and ps.CONSTITUENT_ID = #constituentId# and ps.INACTIVE = false and ps.PAYMENT_TYPE in
#paymentTypes[]#
order by PAYMENT_SRC_TYPE

select innerQuery.*, IF ($sortColumn$ IS NULL or $sortColumn$ = '', 1, 0) AS isnull from
(select , ps.CREDIT_CARD_NUMBER as PAYMENT_SRC_CREDIT_CARD_NUMBER_READ_ONLY, ps.ACH_ACCOUNT_NUMBER as PAYMENT_SRC_ACH_ACCOUNT_NUMBER_READ_ONLY, ps.ACH_ROUTING_NUMBER as PAYMENT_SRC_ACH_ROUTING_NUMBER_READ_ONLY, , ,
custFld.FIELD_VALUE
from PAYMENT_SOURCE ps inner join CONSTITUENT p ON ps.CONSTITUENT_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID left outer join PHONE ph on ps.PHONE_ID = ph.PHONE_ID left outer join ADDRESS addr on ps.ADDRESS_ID = addr.ADDRESS_ID
left outer join CUSTOM_FIELD custFld on ps.PAYMENT_SOURCE_ID = custFld.ENTITY_ID and custFld.ENTITY_TYPE = #entityType# and DATE(#asOfDate#) >= custFld.START_DATE and DATE(#asOfDate#) <= custFld.END_DATE and custFld.FIELD_NAME = #fieldName#
where p.SITE_NAME = #siteName# and ps.CONSTITUENT_ID = #constituentId#) as innerQuery order by isnull ASC, $sortColumn$ + '0' $sortDir$, $sortColumn$ $sortDir$ limit $offset$,$limit$
select count(ps.PAYMENT_SOURCE_ID) from PAYMENT_SOURCE ps inner join CONSTITUENT p on ps.CONSTITUENT_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID where p.SITE_NAME = #siteName# and ps.CONSTITUENT_ID = #constituentId#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into PAYMENT_SOURCE (ACH_ACCOUNT_NUMBER, ACH_HOLDER_NAME, ACH_ROUTING_NUMBER, CREDIT_CARD_EXPIRATION, CREDIT_CARD_HOLDER_NAME, CREDIT_CARD_NUMBER, CREDIT_CARD_TYPE, INACTIVE, LAST_FOUR_DIGITS, PAYMENT_PROFILE, PAYMENT_TYPE, ADDRESS_ID, CONSTITUENT_ID, PHONE_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE ) values (#achAccountNumberEncrypted#, #achHolderName#, #achRoutingNumber#, #creditCardExpiration#, #creditCardHolderName#, #creditCardNumberEncrypted#, #creditCardType#, #inactive#, #lastFourDigits#, #profile#, #paymentType#, #address.id#, #constituent.id#, #phone.id#, now(), now())
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
sqlMap.update: update PAYMENT_SOURCE set ACH_ACCOUNT_NUMBER = #achAccountNumberEncrypted#, ACH_HOLDER_NAME = #achHolderName#, ACH_ROUTING_NUMBER = #achRoutingNumber#, CREDIT_CARD_EXPIRATION = #creditCardExpiration#, CREDIT_CARD_HOLDER_NAME = #creditCardHolderName#, CREDIT_CARD_NUMBER = #creditCardNumberEncrypted#, CREDIT_CARD_TYPE = #creditCardType#, INACTIVE = #inactive#, LAST_FOUR_DIGITS = #lastFourDigits#, PAYMENT_PROFILE = #profile#, PAYMENT_TYPE = #paymentType#, ADDRESS_ID = #address.id#, CONSTITUENT_ID = #constituent.id#, PHONE_ID = #phone.id#, UPDATE_DATE = now() where PAYMENT_SOURCE_ID = #id#
